description.text: This is called by Unity when inspecting assets to determine if they can potentially be opened for editing.

Specifies how Unity should query the version control system. The default value is StatusQueryOptions.UseCachedIfPossible.
指定 Unity 应如何查询版本控制系统。默认值为 StatusQueryOptions.UseCachedIfPossible。

Dialog prompt to show to the user, if a version control operation needs to be done. If null (default), no prompt is shown.
要向用户显示的对话框提示（如果需要执行版本控制操作）。如果为 /null/（默认值），则不显示任何提示。

Unity 在即将创建未导入的资源（例如，.meta 文件）时调用此方法。
Unity calls this method when it is about to create an Asset you haven't imported (for example, .meta files).

在完成任意数量的资源导入后（当资源进度条到达末尾时）调用此函数。
This is called after importing of any number of assets is complete (when the Assets progress bar has reached the end).
任意の数のアセットのインポートが完了した後に呼び出されます（アセットの進捗バーが最後まで到達したとき）
This is called after importing of any number of assets is complete (when the Assets progress bar has reached the end).

This callback is used by C# code editors to modify the .csproj files.
このコールバックは C# コードエディターが .csproj ファイルを変更するために使用されます。
이 콜백은 .csproj 파일을 수정하기 위해 C# 코드 에디터에 의해 사용됩니다
C# 代码编辑器使用此回调来修改 .csproj 文件。

This is undocumented, and a 'safeguard' for when Visual Studio gets a new release that is incompatible with Unity, so that users can postprocess our csproj files to fix the issue (or just completely replace them). Hopefully we'll never need this.
これはドキュメント化されておらず、Visual Studio が Unity と互換性のない新しいリリースになったときの 'セーフガード' であるため、ユーザーは csproj ファイルを後処理して問題を解決できます (または単に完全に置換できます)。うまくいけば、これは不要になります。
이는 문서화되지 않았으며 Visual Studio의 새 릴리스가 Unity와 호환되지 않는 경우를 위한 '보호 장치'로서, 이를 통해 사용자는 csproj 파일을 후처리하여 문제를 해결할 수 있습니다(또는 단순히 전면 교체). 이것이 필요한 상황이 오지 않기를 바랍니다.
此项目未记录，并且是 Visual Studio 获得与 Unity 不兼容的新版本时的“保障”，这样用户便可对我们的 csproj 文件进行后处理来修正问题(或完全替换它们)。希望我们永远不需要这个。
This callback is used by C# code editors to modify the .sln file

This callback is used by UnityVS to take over project generation from Unity
このコールバックは UnityVS が Unity からプロジェクトの生成を引き継ぐために使用されます
이 콜백은 프로젝트 생성을 Unity에서 인계받기 위해 UnityVS에 의해 사용됩니다
UnityVS 使用此回调从 Unity 接管项目生成

在摄像机渲染场景后，将调用 OnRenderObject。
OnRenderObject is called after camera has rendered the Scene.
OnRenderObject is called after camera has rendered the Scene.
OnRenderObject is called after camera has rendered the Scene.
如果对象可见，则为每个摄像机调用 OnWillRenderObject。
OnWillRenderObject is called for each camera if the object is visible.
OnWillRenderObject はカメラからオブジェクトが可視状態の場合、各カメラごとに一回呼び出されます。
OnWillRenderObject is called for each camera if the object is visible.
当该控制器在执行 Move 时撞到碰撞体时调用 OnControllerColliderHit。
OnControllerColliderHit is called when the controller hits a collider while performing a Move.
OnControllerColliderHit はキャラクターコントローラーが移動中にコライダーに衝突した際に、呼び出されます。
OnControllerColliderHit is called when the controller hits a collider while performing a Move.
当该碰撞体/刚体已开始接触另一个刚体/碰撞体时，调用 OnCollisionEnter。
OnCollisionEnter is called when this collider/rigidbody has begun touching another rigidbody/collider.
この collider/rigidbody は他の collider/rigidbody に触れたときに OnCollisionEnter は呼び出されます。
OnCollisionEnter is called when this collider/rigidbody has begun touching another rigidbody/collider.
The Collision data associated with this collision event.
与该碰撞事件关联的 Collision 数据。
衝突イベントと関連する Collision データ
The Collision data associated with this collision event.
当该碰撞体/刚体已停止接触另一个刚体/碰撞体时，调用 OnCollisionExit。
OnCollisionExit is called when this collider/rigidbody has stopped touching another rigidbody/collider.
この collider/rigidbody が他の collider/rigidbody と触れ合うのをやめたときに OnCollisionExit は呼び出されます。
OnCollisionExit is called when this collider/rigidbody has stopped touching another rigidbody/collider.
The Collision data associated with this collision event.
与该碰撞事件关联的 Collision 数据。
衝突イベントと関連する Collision データ
The Collision data associated with this collision event.
对应正在接触刚体/碰撞体的每一个碰撞体/刚体，每帧调用一次 OnCollisionStay。
OnCollisionStay is called once per frame for every collider/rigidbody that is touching rigidbody/collider.
OnCollisionStay は rigidbody/collider が他の rigidbody/collider に触れている間毎フレーム 1 度だけ呼び出されます。
OnCollisionStay is called once per frame for every collider/rigidbody that is touching rigidbody/collider.
The Collision data associated with this collision event.
与该碰撞事件关联的 Collision 数据。
衝突イベントと関連する Collision データ
The Collision data associated with this collision event.
GameObject 与另一个 GameObject 碰撞时，Unity 会调用 OnTriggerEnter。
When a GameObject collides with another GameObject, Unity calls OnTriggerEnter.
When a GameObject collides with another GameObject, Unity calls OnTriggerEnter.
When a GameObject collides with another GameObject, Unity calls OnTriggerEnter.
The other Collider involved in this collision.
该碰撞中涉及的其他 Collider。
この衝突に含まれるその他の Collider
The other Collider involved in this collision.
当 Collider other 已停止接触该触发器时调用 OnTriggerExit。
OnTriggerExit is called when the Collider other has stopped touching the trigger.
Collider が other のトリガーに触れるのをやめたときに OnTriggerExit は呼び出されます。
OnTriggerExit is called when the Collider other has stopped touching the trigger.
The other Collider involved in this collision.
该碰撞中涉及的其他 Collider。
この衝突に含まれるその他の Collider
The other Collider involved in this collision.
对于正在接触该触发器的每个其他 Collider，“几乎”所有帧都调用 OnTriggerStay。此函数位于物理计时器上，因此它不必运行每个帧。
OnTriggerStay is called almost all the frames for every Collider other that is touching the trigger. The function is on the physics timer so it won't necessarily run every frame.
OnTriggerStay is called almost all the frames for every Collider other that is touching the trigger. The function is on the physics timer so it won't necessarily run every frame.
OnTriggerStay is called almost all the frames for every Collider other that is touching the trigger. The function is on the physics timer so it won't necessarily run every frame.
The other Collider involved in this collision.
该碰撞中涉及的其他 Collider。
この衝突に含まれるその他の Collider
The other Collider involved in this collision.
当传入碰撞体与该对象的碰撞体接触时发送（仅限 2D 物理）。
Sent when an incoming collider makes contact with this object's collider (2D physics only).
オブジェクトのコライダーが別のコライダーに衝突したときに呼び出されます（2D 物理挙動のみ）
Sent when an incoming collider makes contact with this object's collider (2D physics only).
The Collision2D data associated with this collision.
与该碰撞关联的 Collision2D 数据。
この衝突に関係のある Collision2D データ
The Collision2D data associated with this collision.
当另一个对象上的碰撞体停止接触该对象的碰撞体时发送（仅限 2D 物理）。
Sent when a collider on another object stops touching this object's collider (2D physics only).
オブジェクトのコライダーと別のオブジェクトコライダーが衝突から離れた瞬間に呼び出されます（2D 物理挙動のみ）
Sent when a collider on another object stops touching this object's collider (2D physics only).
The Collision2D data associated with this collision.

Sent each frame where a collider on another object is touching this object's collider (2D physics only).
オブジェクトのコライダーと別のオブジェクトのコライダーが衝突している間、毎フレーム呼び出され続けます（2D 物理挙動のみ）
Sent each frame where a collider on another object is touching this object's collider (2D physics only).

当另一个对象进入附加到该对象的触发碰撞体时发送（仅限 2D 物理）。
Sent when another object enters a trigger collider attached to this object (2D physics only).
オブジェクトにアタッチしたトリガーの中に別のオブジェクトが入ったときに呼び出されます。（2D 物理挙動のみ）
Sent when another object enters a trigger collider attached to this object (2D physics only).
The other Collider2D involved in this collision.
该碰撞中涉及的其他 Collider2D。
The other Collider2D involved in this collision.
The other Collider2D involved in this collision.
当另一个对象离开附加到该对象的触发碰撞体时发送（仅限 2D 物理）。
Sent when another object leaves a trigger collider attached to this object (2D physics only).
トリガー状態のオブジェクトのコライダーと別のオブジェクトのコライダーが衝突から離れた瞬間に、呼び出されます。（2D 物理挙動のみ）
Sent when another object leaves a trigger collider attached to this object (2D physics only).
The other Collider2D involved in this collision.

他の Collider2D がこの衝突に関係しているか。
The other Collider2D involved in this collision.
在另一个对象位于附加到该对象的触发碰撞体之内时发送每个帧（仅限 2D 物理）。
Sent each frame where another object is within a trigger collider attached to this object (2D physics only).
トリガー状態のオブジェクトのコライダーと別のオブジェクトのコライダー衝突している間、毎フレーム呼び出され続けます。（2D 物理挙動のみ）

OnBecameInvisible 在渲染器对任何摄像机都不可见时调用。
OnBecameInvisible is called when the renderer is no longer visible by any camera.

OnBecameVisible is called when the renderer became visible by any camera.
当该碰撞体/刚体已开始接触另一个刚体/碰撞体时，调用 OnCollisionEnter。
OnCollisionEnter is called when this collider/rigidbody has begun touching another rigidbody/collider.
この collider/rigidbody は他の collider/rigidbody に触れたときに OnCollisionEnter は呼び出されます。
OnCollisionEnter is called when this collider/rigidbody has begun touching another rigidbody/collider.

parameter.name: other
parameter.justification: Removing collision parameter avoids unnecessary calculations

当粒子击中碰撞体时，将调用 OnParticleCollision。
OnParticleCollision is called when a particle hits a Collider.
パーティクルがコライダーにヒットしたときに OnParticleCollision が呼び出されます
OnParticleCollision is called when a particle hits a Collider.
系统中的所有粒子都死亡时，便会调用 OnParticleSystemStopped，然后将不再产生新粒子。在调用 Stop 之后，或者超过非循环系统的 Duration 属性时，将停止产生新粒子。

OnParticleSystemStopped is called when all particles in the system have died, and no new particles will be born. New particles cease to be created either after Stop is called, or when the duration property of a non-looping system has been exceeded.

OnParticleSystemStopped is called when all particles in the system have died, and no new particles will be born. New particles cease to be created either after Stop is called, or when the duration property of a non-looping system has been exceeded.

OnParticleSystemStopped is called when all particles in the system have died, and no new particles will be born. New particles cease to be created either after Stop is called, or when the duration property of a non-looping system has been exceeded.
粒子系统中的任何粒子满足触发模块中的条件时，将调用 OnParticleTrigger。
OnParticleTrigger is called when any particles in a Particle System meet the conditions in the trigger module.
OnParticleTrigger is called when any particles in a Particle System meet the conditions in the trigger module.
OnParticleTrigger is called when any particles in a Particle System meet the conditions in the trigger module.
调度粒子系统的内置更新作业时，会调用 OnParticleUpdateJobScheduled。
OnParticleUpdateJobScheduled is called when a Particle System's built-in update job has been scheduled.
OnParticleUpdateJobScheduled is called when a Particle System's built-in update job has been scheduled.
OnParticleUpdateJobScheduled is called when a Particle System's built-in update job has been scheduled.

当 GameObject 的变换的子项列表发生更改时，将调用该函数。

This function is called when the parent property of the transform of the GameObject has changed.
GameObject 与另一个 GameObject 碰撞时，Unity 会调用 OnTriggerEnter。
When a GameObject collides with another GameObject, Unity calls OnTriggerEnter.
When a GameObject collides with another GameObject, Unity calls OnTriggerEnter.
When a GameObject collides with another GameObject, Unity calls OnTriggerEnter.
A Collider involved in this collision.
该碰撞中涉及 Collider。
A Collider involved in this collision.
A Collider involved in this collision.
当另一个对象进入附加到该对象的触发碰撞体时发送（仅限 2D 物理）。
Sent when another object enters a trigger collider attached to this object (2D physics only).
オブジェクトにアタッチしたトリガーの中に別のオブジェクトが入ったときに呼び出されます。（2D 物理挙動のみ）
Sent when another object enters a trigger collider attached to this object (2D physics only).
The other Collider2D involved in this collision.
该碰撞中涉及的其他 Collider2D。
他の Collider2D がこの衝突に関係しているか。
The other Collider2D involved in this collision.
当 Collider other 已停止接触该触发器时调用 OnTriggerExit。
OnTriggerExit is called when the Collider other has stopped touching the trigger.
Collider が other のトリガーに触れるのをやめたときに OnTriggerExit は呼び出されます。
OnTriggerExit is called when the Collider other has stopped touching the trigger.
The other Collider involved in this collision.
该碰撞中涉及的其他 Collider。
この衝突に含まれるその他の Collider
The other Collider involved in this collision.
当另一个对象离开附加到该对象的触发碰撞体时发送（仅限 2D 物理）。
Sent when another object leaves a trigger collider attached to this object (2D physics only).
トリガー状態のオブジェクトのコライダーと別のオブジェクトのコライダーが衝突から離れた瞬間に、呼び出されます。（2D 物理挙動のみ）
Sent when another object leaves a trigger collider attached to this object (2D physics only).
The other Collider2D involved in this collision.
该碰撞中涉及的其他 Collider2D。
他の Collider2D がこの衝突に関係しているか。
The other Collider2D involved in this collision.
对于接触触发器的每一个 Collider /other/，每次物理更新调用一次 OnTriggerStay。
OnTriggerStay is called once per physics update for every Collider other that is touching the trigger.
OnTriggerStay is called once per physics update for every Collider other that is touching the trigger.
OnTriggerStay is called once per physics update for every Collider other that is touching the trigger.
The other Collider involved in this collision.
该碰撞中涉及的其他 Collider。
この衝突に含まれるその他の Collider
The other Collider involved in this collision.
在另一个对象位于附加到该对象的触发碰撞体之内时发送每个帧（仅限 2D 物理）。
Sent each frame where another object is within a trigger collider attached to this object (2D physics only).
トリガー状態のオブジェクトのコライダーと別のオブジェクトのコライダー衝突している間、毎フレーム呼び出され続けます。（2D 物理挙動のみ）
Sent each frame where another object is within a trigger collider attached to this object (2D physics only).
The other Collider2D involved in this collision.
该碰撞中涉及的其他 Collider2D。
他の Collider2D がこの衝突に関係しているか。
The other Collider2D involved in this collision.
Editor-only function that Unity calls when the script is loaded or a value changes in the Inspector.
Editor-only function that Unity calls when the script is loaded or a value changes in the Inspector.
Editor-only function that Unity calls when the script is loaded or a value changes in the Inspector.
This function is called when the script is loaded or a value is changed in the Inspector (Called in the editor only).
如果对象可见并且不是 UI 元素，则为每个摄像机调用 OnWillRenderObject。
OnWillRenderObject is called for each camera if the object is visible and not a UI element.
OnWillRenderObject is called for each camera if the object is visible and not a UI element.
OnWillRenderObject is called for each camera if the object is visible and not a UI element.
重置为默认值。
Reset to default values.
デフォルト値にリセットします
Reset to default values.
在首次调用任何 Update 方法之前启用脚本时，在帧上调用 Start。
Start is called on the frame when a script is enabled just before any of the Update methods are called the first time.
Start is called on the frame when a script is enabled just before any of the Update methods are called the first time.
Start is called on the frame when a script is enabled just before any of the Update methods are called the first time.
如果启用了 MonoBehaviour，则每帧调用 Update。
Update is called every frame, if the MonoBehaviour is enabled.
Update は MonoBehaviour が有効の場合に、毎フレーム呼び出されます
Update is called every frame, if the MonoBehaviour is enabled.
This callback is called if an associated RectTransform has its dimensions changed.
このコールバックは関連付けられた RectTransform の寸法が変更された場合に呼び出されます。
이 콜백은 연결된 RectTransform의 크기가 변경된 경우 호출됩니다.
如果关联的 RectTransform 的维度发生更改，则会调用此回调。
OnBecameInvisible 在对象对任何摄像机都不可见时调用。
OnBecameInvisible is called when the object is no longer visible by any camera.
"OnBecameInvisible" は任意のカメラでオブジェクトが表示されなくなるときに呼び出されます。
OnBecameInvisible is called when the object is no longer visible by any camera.
OnBecameVisible 在对象变为对任意摄像机可见时调用。
OnBecameVisible is called when the object became visible by any camera.
"OnBecameVisible" は任意のカメラでオブジェクトが見えるようになったときに呼び出されます。
OnBecameVisible is called when the object became visible by any camera.
当该碰撞体/刚体已开始接触另一个刚体/碰撞体时，调用 OnCollisionEnter。
OnCollisionEnter is called when this collider/rigidbody has begun touching another rigidbody/collider.
この collider/rigidbody は他の collider/rigidbody に触れたときに OnCollisionEnter は呼び出されます。
OnCollisionEnter is called when this collider/rigidbody has begun touching another rigidbody/collider.
当该碰撞体/刚体已停止接触另一个刚体/碰撞体时，调用 OnCollisionExit。
OnCollisionExit is called when this collider/rigidbody has stopped touching another rigidbody/collider.
この collider/rigidbody が他の collider/rigidbody と触れ合うのをやめたときに OnCollisionExit は呼び出されます。
OnCollisionExit is called when this collider/rigidbody has stopped touching another rigidbody/collider.
对应正在接触刚体/碰撞体的每一个碰撞体/刚体，每帧调用一次 OnCollisionStay。
OnCollisionStay is called once per frame for every collider/rigidbody that is touching rigidbody/collider.
OnCollisionStay は rigidbody/collider が他の rigidbody/collider に触れている間毎フレーム 1 度だけ呼び出されます。
OnCollisionStay is called once per frame for every collider/rigidbody that is touching rigidbody/collider.
当 ScriptableObject 脚本启动时调用此函数。
This function is called when the ScriptableObject script is started.
ScriptableObject スクリプトを開始するとき、この関数は呼び出されます。
This function is called when the ScriptableObject script is started.
当脚本化对象将销毁时调用此函数。
This function is called when the scriptable object will be destroyed.
ScriptableObject が破棄されるとき、この関数は呼び出されます。
This function is called when the scriptable object will be destroyed.
当脚本化对象超出范围时调用此函数。
This function is called when the scriptable object goes out of scope.
ScriptableObject クラスのオブジェクトがスコープを外れるとき、この関数は呼び出されます。
This function is called when the scriptable object goes out of scope.
当对象加载时调用此函数。
This function is called when the object is loaded.
オブジェクトがロードされたとき、この関数は呼び出されます。
This function is called when the object is loaded.

当用户单击 Create 按钮时，将调用此函数。
This is called when the user clicks on the Create button.
これはユーザーが Creat ボタンを押したときに呼び出されます。
This is called when the user clicks on the Create button.
允许您在用户单击 Others 按钮时提供操作。
Allows you to provide an action when the user clicks on the other button.
ユーザーが他のボタンをクリックしたときにアクションを提供できます
Allows you to provide an action when the user clicks on the other button.
在向导打开或者用户在向导中更改内容时，将调用此函数。
This is called when the wizard is opened or whenever the user changes something in the wizard.
ウィザードを開いたときやユーザーがウィザードで何かを変更するたびに呼び出されます
This is called when the wizard is opened or whenever the user changes something in the wizard.
A static callback that you can implement to set up artifact dependencies to other Assets, and optimize the order your assets are imported.

当状态机评估此状态时，在第一个 Update 帧上进行调用。
Called on the first Update frame when a state machine evaluate this state.
Called on the first Update frame when a state machine evaluate this state.
Called on the first Update frame when a state machine evaluate this state.
当状态机评估此状态时，在最后一个 Update 帧上进行调用。
Called on the last update frame when a state machine evaluate this state.
Called on the last update frame when a state machine evaluate this state.
Called on the last update frame when a state machine evaluate this state.
刚好在 MonoBehaviour.OnAnimatorIK 后调用。
Called right after MonoBehaviour.OnAnimatorIK.
MonoBehaviour.OnAnimatorIK の直後に呼び出されます。
Called right after MonoBehaviour.OnAnimatorIK.
刚好在 MonoBehaviour.OnAnimatorMove 后调用。
Called right after MonoBehaviour.OnAnimatorMove.
MonoBehaviour.OnAnimatorMove の直後に呼び出されます。
Called right after MonoBehaviour.OnAnimatorMove.
除第一帧和最后一帧外，在每个 Update 帧上进行调用。
Called at each Update frame except for the first and last frame.
最初と最後のフレームを除いて Update フレームごとに呼び出されます。
Called at each Update frame except for the first and last frame.
